> Then I look the job folder which order.xml I supplied to the
> crawler. I found here many folder generated by crawler. There is an
> folder "arcs" which contains arc file. When I tried to open this arc
> file through winzip, it is telling "Invalid Header" and I am not
> able to open it.

Winzip can open a .gz file and extract the .arc file(s) inside, but it 
can't open the .arc file.  The .arc file is not in a format that Winzip 
understands... it is a special Internet Archive format.  See

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heritrix

for more info on ARC files.

Frank
